mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoJobRequstAnsAtchmnfl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REQUST_SN , JOB_REQUST_ANS_TURN , REQUST_ANS_ATCHMNFL_TURN , REQUST_ANS_ATCH_FILE_NM , REQUST_ANS_ATCH_FILE_URL , REQUST_ANS_ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_JOB_REQUST_ANS_ATCHMNFL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_SN = #{requstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND JOB_REQUST_ANS_TURN = #{jobRequstAnsTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REQUST_ANS_ATCHMNFL_TURN = #{requstAnsAtchmnflTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
